name: HSP_PREADM_TEST
description: The HSP_PREADM_TEST table contains information on preadmission testing. Each record in this table is based on PAT_ENC_CSN_ID.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the patient with this preadmission test.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number of the preadmission test for the patient.

columns.name: DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the department where the preadmission test is scheduled for the patient.

columns.name: PREADM_TST_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value corresponding to the status of the preadmission test for the patient.

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: The coded procedure of the preadmission test for the patient.

columns.name: PREADM_APPT_NOTE
columns.description: Free text note associated with preadmission test appointment for the patient.

columns.name: PREADM_TST_PRI_C_NAME
columns.description: The priority category of the preadmission test for the patient.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system.
